column2: AI bonus for nomad Lucky Rulers.
I can choose to settle my tribe permanently.
column3: Je peux fixer ma tribu de manière permanente.
column4: Ich kann beschließen, meinen Stamm permanent sesshaft werden zu lassen.
column6: Puedo elegir establecer a mi tribu permanentemente.

column2: Our ancestors once rode the steppes atop our noble steeds, warriors and conquerors without equal! Perhaps it is time for us to leave our hillside dwellings and roam once again.

[FromFrom.GetBestName] has declared that [FromFrom.GetSheHe] intends to lead the [FromFrom.Culture.GetName] people to settle, to transform from roaming nomads to tribesmen who live in forts. The question that stands before you now is whether your own clan will join [FromFrom.GetHerHim].

[Root.GetBestName] has proven himself a capable warrior, to the point that he has inspired his [Root.Culture.GetName] followers to assemble their clans and follow him as their nomadic leader. Nearby rulers are already fearing what this could mean to the balance of power in their region.

[Root.GetBestName] has proven himself a capable warrior and leader, to the point that he has inspired his [Root.Culture.GetName] followers to assemble together as a clan under [Root.Liege.GetBestName].
This will destroy the entire settlement!\n
Not the last, non-nomadic holding in this province
Contains at least one valid tribal holding for settlement
Has neither an ongoing siege nor any occupied holdings
Is the capital and has the building §YClan Gathering Hall II§!
A tribal holding may be constructed in the province
Some of your §YPopulation§! will immediately be turned into §YManpower§!
column3: Une taille de votre §Ypopulation§! sera immédiatement transformée en §Yeffectifs§!
column4: Ein Teil Ihrer §YBevölkerung§ wird sofort zu §YRekrutenreserve§!
column6: Parte de tu §Ypoblación§! se convertirá inmediatamente en §Ysoldadesca§!
